Defender Cromwell:
Nice to meet you! I'm Protector Cromwell, the guard of the Dwarven Village. You've heard about me? Yeah, my name's pretty rare, isn't it?
Let me tell you one thing. There is a seashore to the north of this place. It's the best place if you want to take a rest. On my free days I usually go there to get some fresh air. Of course, it's better to spend time there with a loved one, but it's good even if you're alone.
